titles.title: A resolution supporting measures taken by the Government of Taiwan to deter, or if so compelled, defeat, aggression by the Government of the People's Republic of China.
A resolution supporting measures taken by the Government of Taiwan to deter, or if so compelled, defeat, aggression by the Government of the People's Republic of China.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the government of Taiwan and its efforts to counter China's hostile actions against Taiwan.
